## Useful Info

**Draconian scorchers** are powerful [fire elementalists](/Fire_elementalist "Fire elementalist") who tend to blast you and everything around you with overwhelming [Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic"). Although less capable of dealing massive damage than [draconian annihilators](/Draconian_annihilator "Draconian annihilator"), they are still a major threat, as their [hellfire](/Hellfire "Hellfire") attacks can pierce any character's defenses. They are commonly found in [the Realm of Zot](/The_Realm_of_Zot "The Realm of Zot"), and occasionally appear in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss") as well. Scorchers typically generate as [red draconians](/Red_draconian "Red draconian"), who have a [Searing Breath](/Searing_Breath "Searing Breath").

| Slot2       | [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma") (3d25)                   | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot3       | [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") (3d26)                                  | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot4       | [Hurl Damnation](/Hurl_Damnation "Hurl Damnation") (3d20)                | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot5       | [Call Down Damnation](/Call_Down_Damnation "Call Down Damnation") (3d15) | [Emergency flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

Being adjacent to a scorcher will usually prevent them from casting fireball or hellfire, due to a reluctancy to blow themselves up.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), classed draconians generated with random colours.
- In [0.24](/0.24 "0.24"), they can use [Call Down Damnation](/Call_Down_Damnation "Call Down Damnation") when not at low HP.
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), they could cast [Sticky Flame Range](/Sticky_Flame_Range "Sticky Flame Range") instead of [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma").
- Draconian scorchers, as with the other [monster draconians](/List_of_draconians "List of draconians"), were added in [0.1](/0.1 "0.1").

A cunning draconian who has mastered the inner secrets of the element of fire. Its scales are sooty from years of magical pyrotechnics.

“Trogdor was a man!
I mean, he was a dragon-man!
Or... maybe he was just a dragon.
...
And the Trogdor comes in the night!”
-The Brothers Chaps, “Trogdor”. 2003.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Draconian scorchers are powerful fire elementalists who tend to blast you and everything around you with overwhelming Fire Magic. Although less capable of dealing massive damage than draconian annihilators, they are still a major threat, as their hellfire attacks can pierce any character's defenses. They are commonly found in the Realm of Zot, and occasionally appear in the Abyss as well. Scorchers typically generate as red draconians, who have a Searing Breath.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Fire (3d25) Wizard flag
Slot2 Bolt of Magma (3d25) Wizard flag
Slot3 Fireball (3d26) Wizard flag
Slot4 Hurl Damnation (3d20) Wizard flag
Slot5 Call Down Damnation (3d15) Emergency flag,
Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

Being adjacent to a scorcher will usually prevent them from casting fireball or hellfire, due to a reluctancy to blow themselves up.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, classed draconians generated with random colours.
  • In 0.24, they can use Call Down Damnation when not at low HP.
  • Prior to 0.16, they could cast Sticky Flame Range instead of Bolt of Magma.
  • Draconian scorchers, as with the other monster draconians, were added in 0.1.
